high_descs: Turn around and take one step, then turn left to face the sink.
Pick up the green candle that is on the counter.
Turn around and walk across the room.
Put the green candle on top of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move the candle to the top of the toilet.

high_descs: Walk to the edge of the kitchen sink on your right.
Pick up a candle from the edge of the sink.
Walk to the edge of the toilet on the right.
Place the candle on the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from the sink to the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and head to the sink nearest to the toilet.
Pick up the candle to the right of the sink.
Move to the right slightly and face the toilet.
Put the candle on the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from the counter to the toilet.
